com.ccjk.cybex.barcodegen.views.main

Class ControllerMain

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ccjk.cybex.barcodegen.views.main.ControllerMain
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    OrderListener, java.io.Serializable

    public class ControllerMain
extends java.lang.Object
implements OrderListener, java.io.Serializable
    ControllerMain is used to provide some seperation between ui and logic on MainFrame
    See Also:

      private boolean checkAndWarnPrintBusy()

      (package private) void chooseFile()
      Launch the file selection window of swing.
      (package private) void chooseFolder()
      Launch a directory selection window from swing All files from the directory will be processed to extract orders Orders and last header is store at FileSession * Refresh table of MainFrame after loading
      (package private) void loadExampleXML()
      Load a blank file to make sure everything initializes
      void loadFile()
      load the file store for this session from FileSession Loading is done by OrderXmlParser Orders and header extracted are stored to FileSession Refresh table of MainFrame after loading

      • chooseFile

        void chooseFile()
        Launch the file selection window of swing. Accepts only XML if file load all orders from the file Loading is done by OrderXmlParser Orders and header extracted are stored to FileSession
